data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Medimurska that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Medimurska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Medimurska, Croatia.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 15 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Medimurska, Croatia.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Medimurska, Croatia.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Medimurska. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bosniak people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bosniak people.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 474 believers living in Medimurska, Croatia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Medimurska, Croatia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary:
the state of Medimurska, Croatia has a population of 112,400.

We estimate Medimurska has 474 people who might know Jesus, 103,291 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 8,636 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 237 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, guide the 474 believers in Medimurska to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
